meanings.definition: The quality of being reliable or trustworthy.
meanings.sent1: Her dependabilities in completing tasks on time make her a valuable team member.
meanings.sent2: We appreciate his dependabilities in always showing up for work.
meanings.sent3: His dependabilities in remembering everyone's birthdays are quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The ship's captain relied on the dependabilities of the compass to navigate through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The dependabilities of the old lighthouse guided ships safely to shore for decades.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be counted on or relied upon.
meanings.sent1: The company's success is built on the dependabilities of its employees.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, we look for the dependabilities of our leaders to guide us.
meanings.sent3: The dependabilities of the weather forecast are sometimes questionable.
meanings.sent4: The foundation of a strong friendship is built on mutual dependabilities.
meanings.sent5: The dependabilities of the old bridge were put to the test during the heavy rain.
